publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1808 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2004—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson*

S2M-1808 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2004—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson
